narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Bestself Behavioral Health Inc. is a Clinic/Center  Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in Buffalo, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $57.7M in Medicaid payments across 189K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $57.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
